dataMapping.title: Integrated Audience Strategy
dataMapping.subtitle: Strategic audience prioritization with creative and media alignment

segments.primaryLabel: Segment name (e.g., 'Brand Advocates', 'High-Intent Prospects', 'Consideration Audience', 'Retention Focus')
segments.secondaryLabel: Segment role (e.g., 'Core Audience', 'Growth Segment', 'Efficiency Play', 'Brand Building')
segments.description: Detailed segment profile, behaviors, and strategic importance
segments.actualValue: Current performance metric (e.g., '5.2x ROAS', '18% conversion rate', '+35% brand lift')
segments.targetValue: Performance target (e.g., '6.0x ROAS', '22% conversion rate', '+40% brand lift')
segments.forecastedValue: Projected performance (e.g., '5.8x ROAS', '20% conversion rate', '+38% brand lift')
insights: Key audience insights, behaviors, and brand affinity
risks: Risk factors and mitigation strategies for this segment
recommendations: Integrated targeting, creative, and media strategies

metadata.size: Segment size (e.g., '3.2M users', '22% of target market')

segments.creativeStrategy: Creative approach for this segment (e.g., 'Emotional storytelling', 'Product benefits', 'Social proof')
segments.channelMix: Recommended channel mix (e.g., '40% CTV, 30% Social, 20% Display, 10% Search')
segments.timingStrategy: Optimal timing approach (e.g., 'Prime time focus', 'Weekend emphasis', 'Event-driven')

dataMapping.integrationStrategy: How audience strategy integrates with creative, media, and timing
